definition.doc: Draft extension of NXpositioner to include fields to describe the use of manipulators in photoemission experiments.

field.name: type
field.doc: Type of manipulator, Hexapod, Rod, etc.

field.name: pos_azimuth
field.doc: Angular position in the azimuthal direction

field.name: pos_tilt
field.doc: Angular position in the tilt direction

field.name: pos_polar
field.doc: Angular position in the polar direction

field.name: heater_power
field.doc: Power in the heater for temperature control.

field.name: sample_temperature
field.doc: Temperature at the closest point to the sample

field.name: drain_current
field.doc: Current to neutralize the photoemission current

field.name: sample_bias
field.doc: Possible bias of the sample with trespect to analyser ground
